scenario_text.value:
Wh-wh-why are you checking that treasure
chest?! What good could that do?!

Hmm... Sounds pretty suspicious to me.
I think I see what’s going on here.
Oh, yes... It’s really pretty obvious.

We’re just going to look around a bit more,
okay?

Her Majesty isn’t here! And she’s certainly
not <color=#B41919>stuffed in some treasure</color>—!

Takuma, this is about as suspicious as it
gets.
Be honest. Miu’s hiding in here, isn’t she?

The queen! Would never! Hide someplace! Like
that!
Now all of you GET OUT!!!
